title: Ep. 641 - How To Steal An Election
description:
Lots of “irregularities” in Pennsylvania, Michigan, Wisconsin, Arizona — we’ll go through a number of them on the show. The main charge against Democrats right now is that they’re stuffing ballot boxes.
